property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: mapred.reduce.parallel.copies
property.description: Number of parallel copies run by reduces - set to total number of nodes in the system

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: Maximum map tasks to be run simultaenously.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum
property.description: Maximum reduce tasks to be run simultaenously.

property.name: mapred.child.java.opts
property.description: Large heap-size for child JVMs of maps/reduces
